40070001.Original_Text: 다 보려면 한참 걸릴 것 같으니 \n소협께서도 함께 읽어봐요!
40070001.English_Text: It seems like it will take a while to see everything, so \nSohyup should read it together!
40070001.Chinese_Text: 看来要花点时间才能看到所有内容，所以\nSohyup 应该一起阅读！

40070002.English_Text: (It seems to have been sorted out to some extent, so \n should I also check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>stone</>?)
40070002.Chinese_Text: （好像已经整理到了某种程度，所以\n我是否也应该检查一下<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>石头</>？）

40070003.Original_Text: 대발견! 대발견이에요 소협!\n제 근처로 한번 와보세요!
40070003.English_Text: Great discovery! It's a great discovery, so small! \nCome near me!
40070003.Chinese_Text: 伟大的发现！这是一个伟大的发现，这么小！\n靠近我！

40070004.English_Text: (I didn't mean to investigate only here... I have to say \n to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Red plum</>)
40070004.Chinese_Text: （我不是故意在这里调查的……我要对<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>红梅</>说\n）

40070005.Original_Text: 다시 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>거미</>들이 몰려오기 전에 \n가 있을게요! \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>어둠 숲</>에서 만나요. 소협!
40070005.English_Text: Before the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spiders</> come back, \n will be there! \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>See you at Darkwood</>.
40070005.Chinese_Text: 在<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>回来之前，\n会在那里！\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>黑木城见</>。

40070006.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>어둠 숲</>은 넓으니까\n쪼개져서 조사하도록 해요!\n그러면 탐사 시작!
40070006.English_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dark Forest</> is large, so let's split it up and investigate!\nThen let's start exploring!
40070006.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>黑暗森林</>很大，所以我们把它分开调查！\n然后我们开始探索吧！

40070007.Original_Text: 이 곳의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야금</>들은 \n다른 곳의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야금</>들과 \n조금 다른 것 같은데요? 흠...
40070007.English_Text: I think the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>metallurgy</> here are a little different from \n other places <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>metallurgy</>
40070007.Chinese_Text: 我觉得这里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>冶金</>和\n其他地方的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>冶金</>有点不同

40070008.Original_Text: (이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>오염된 흔적</>은 어디서 \n본 적이 있는 것 같은데...)
40070008.English_Text: (I think I've seen this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>contaminated trace</> somewhere...)
40070008.Chinese_Text: （我想我已经在某处看到了这个 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>受污染的痕迹</>...）

40070009.English_Text: (If this is enough, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Yoo Ae-rin</> will be easier to \n research)
40070009.Chinese_Text: （如果这足够了，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Yoo Ae-rin</> 会更容易\n研究）

40070010.Original_Text: (이 야금 시체에 남아있는 검상... \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은새벽단의 무기</>랑 똑같아)
40070010.English_Text: (Swords left on this metallurgical corpse... \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Same as Blackdawn's weapon</>)
40070010.Chinese_Text: （这具冶金尸体上留下了剑……\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>与 Blackdawn 的武器相同</>）

40070015.Original_Text: 저 녀석, 생각보다\n털털한 구석이 있네...\n깜짝 놀라라.
40070015.English_Text: That guy, there's a more bubbly corner than I thought...\nsurprise.
40070015.Chinese_Text: 那家伙，有一个比我想象的还要多泡的角落……\nsurprise。

40070016.Chinese_Text: （我想我已经收集了足够的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>血</>来\n...）

40070017.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Crazy for poison...?</>\nIs there something wrong with the pharmacy?)

40070018.English_Text: Hmm... I think I'm good enough with this.
40070018.Chinese_Text: 嗯……我觉得我已经够用了。

40070019.English_Text: Sorry, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Suck the blood of mortals</> and bring it to me!
40070019.Chinese_Text: 对不起，\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>吸凡人的血</>，把它带给我！

40070020.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bulma's blood</> \nwhere are you going to use this?)
40070020.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>布尔玛的血</> \n你要在哪里用这个？)

40070021.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>불마자의 혈액</>을\n이렇게나 많이...!\n이 정도면 충분할 것 같아요!
40070021.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bulgar's blood</>\nso much...!\nI think this should be enough!
40070021.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>保加利亚人的血</>\n这么多...！\n我想这应该够了！

40070022.English_Text: (...later I'll have to tell <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> not to \neat <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hwandan</>)

40070024.English_Text: (The surrounding <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Monsters</> have been slain, so \nslowly I can find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Relics</>)
40070024.Chinese_Text: （周围的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>怪物</>已被杀死，所以\nslowly我可以找到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>遗物</>）

40070026.English_Text: (There are people with really diverse circumstances here)
40070026.Chinese_Text: （这里的人的情况真的很多样化）

40070036.Original_Text: (완전히 이성을 잃은 듯 한데... \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>갈라진 대지의 불마자</>를 \n처치해주면 진정할까?)
40070036.English_Text: (You seem to have completely lost your mind... \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Is it calming if I \nkill the Bulmer of the Cracked Earth</>?)
40070036.Chinese_Text: （你似乎已经完全失去理智了...\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>如果我\nkill the Bulmer of the Cracked Earth 会平静吗</>？）

40070037.Original_Text: (이 정도면 수도 꽤 줄었으니... \n돌아가서 한 번 달래보자)
40070037.English_Text: (The number has decreased quite a bit... \nLet's go back and comfort him)
40070037.Chinese_Text: （人数减少了不少……\n我们回去安慰他吧）

40070038.Original_Text: (이건 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>그 사람이 입고 있던</>\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>옷조각</>인 것 같네. \n피가 묻은 걸 보니 이미...)

40070039.English_Text: (Even though I was afraid of revenge, \nuntil I lay down my life like this...)
40070039.Chinese_Text: （虽然我很害怕报复，\n直到我这样舍弃我的生命......）

40070040.English_Text: (I think this should be enough. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>back to shelter</>...)
40070040.Chinese_Text: （我认为这应该足够了。\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>回到避难所</>...）

40070041.English_Text: (I'm glad it seems to have ended with this...)
40070041.Chinese_Text: （我很高兴似乎就这样结束了……）

40070042.English_Text: (If this is enough, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Axe</> seems to have gathered some \n...)
40070042.Chinese_Text: （如果这样就够了，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Axe</> 好像收集到了一些\n...）

40070043.Chinese_Text: （嗯？我在某处听到\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>熟悉的声音</>）

40070045.English_Text: (Once the problem seems to have been resolved, \nI'm glad)
40070045.Chinese_Text: （一旦问题似乎已经解决，\n我很高兴）

40070046.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Traces of people moving</>... \nI can follow this)
40070046.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>人们移动的痕迹</>...\n我可以关注这个)

40070047.English_Text: (I scared you properly, so I won't run around again...)
40070047.Chinese_Text: （我把你吓坏了，所以我不会再乱跑了……）

40070048.English_Text: (It seems that you have gathered <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sample</> in moderation, so \nShall we go back soon)
40070048.Chinese_Text: （看来你已经适度收集了<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sample</>，所以\nShall我们很快回去）

40070049.Original_Text: (정말 이상한 사람이다... \n일단 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>식재</>를 구하기 위해 \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>야수의 소굴</>로 가자)
40070049.Chinese_Text: （他真的很奇怪……\n一旦我得到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>种植</> \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>野兽的巢穴</

40070050.English_Text: (We've cleaned up the surrounding threats, \nNow let's collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Jerky Ingredients</>)
40070050.Chinese_Text: （我们已经清理了周围的威胁，\n现在让我们收集<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生涩成分</>）

40070051.Original_Text: (큰 수고를 한 것 같지도 않은데 \n지친 기분이다... \n가서 저녁이나 먹자)
40070051.English_Text: (It doesn't look like you've worked very hard, but \nI'm feeling tired... \nLet's go have dinner)
40070051.Chinese_Text: （看起来你不是很努力，但是\n我感觉很累……\n我们去吃饭吧）

40070052.English_Text: (Somewhere I hear a loud \n noise... \nWhat's going on?)
40070052.Chinese_Text: （我在某处听到很大的\n噪音......\n发生了什么？）

40070053.Original_Text: (정말로 번개를 맞았을까? \n으으, 궁금증을 참을 수 없다!)
40070053.English_Text: (Did you really get hit by lightning? \nUgh, I can't hold back my curiosity!)
40070053.Chinese_Text: （你真的被闪电击中了吗？\n呃，我无法抑制我的好奇心！）

40070054.English_Text: (Now, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spring water</> seems to have been cleaned up too, so let's go check \ntextColor=[255:204:102:255]>Wooden </>
40070054.Chinese_Text: （现在，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>泉水</>好像也被清理干净了，我们去看看\ntextColor=[255:204:102:255]>Wooden </>

40070055.English_Text: (The tree is right, but <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Lightning</> \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I don't see any traces</>...)
40070055.Chinese_Text: （树是对的，但是 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Lightning</> \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我没有看到任何痕迹</>。

40070057.English_Text: (It was meant to be good, but what is the feeling of being deceived...)
40070057.Chinese_Text: （本来是好的，但被骗的感觉是什么……）

40070058.English_Text: (Children can be attacked, so \nI need to clean up the surroundings first)
40070058.Chinese_Text: （孩子会被攻击，所以\n我需要先清理一下周围的环境）

40070059.English_Text: Sohyup, here it is!\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I found the child</>!

40070061.Original_Text: 저는 이 부근을 돌아보고 \n있을 테니, 소협께서는 주변을 \n정리해주시겠어요?
40070061.English_Text: I'll look around this area and stay there, will you please clean up the area around here?
40070061.Chinese_Text: 我去看看这片区域，待在那里，请你把这附近的区域收拾一下好不好？

40070062.English_Text: (This time, you can clean up the area around \n during the investigation)
40070062.Chinese_Text: （这一次，你可以在调查过程中清理\n周围的区域）

40070063.English_Text: (You said you're going to explore the surroundings, so let's deal with \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scavenger</> first)
40070063.Chinese_Text: （你说你要去探索周围，所以我们先处理\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scavenger</>）

40070065.English_Text: (Oh my! <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sassu</> must have caught it. \nI have to help!)
40070065.Chinese_Text: （哦，天哪！<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sassu</> 一定是抓住了它。\n我必须帮忙！）

40070066.English_Text: (Somehow I think I \n a promise I shouldn't have</textColor=[255:204:102:255]>)
40070066.Chinese_Text: （不知何故，我认为我\n了一个我不应该拥有的承诺</textColor=[255:204:102:255]>）

40070067.English_Text: (It went away without a moment to dry... \nMaybe it's dangerous, so I'll go take a look...)
40070067.Chinese_Text: （它没等一会儿就干了……\n也许它很危险，所以我去看看……）

40070068.English_Text: (Hey <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ha Eun-so</>, right? \nThat must have been dangerous too)
40070068.Chinese_Text: （嘿 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ha Eun-so</>，对吧？\n那一定也很危险）

40070069.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</>and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> must have a lot of trouble...

40070070.English_Text: (...<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</> I think I wanted to tell you too)

40070071.English_Text: How is it?! Can you feel the \nfist getting faster?
40070071.Chinese_Text: 怎么样？！你能感觉到\nfist越来越快了吗？

40070072.English_Text: Next time, I'm going to put \nheaviness in that fist!
40070072.Chinese_Text: 下一次，我要把\nheaviness 放在那个拳头里！

40070073.Original_Text: 무거운 마물을 쳐올리기 위해\n담아야 하는 무게를 느껴!
40070073.English_Text: Feel the weight you have to carry in order to hit a heavy monster!
40070073.Chinese_Text: 感受一下你必须承受的重量才能击中一个沉重的怪物！

40070074.Original_Text: 마지막으로는 그 주먹을\n두 시진이고 세 시진이고\n쳐보는 거야!
40070074.English_Text: Finally, I'm going to hit that fist \n two and three jin!
40070074.Chinese_Text: 最后，我要打那个拳头\n二三斤！

40070076.Original_Text: (결국 또 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</> 때문이었나... \n다시 또 이런 짓을 하나 봐라.)
40070076.English_Text: (After all, it was because of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</>... \nLook at something like this again.)
40070076.Chinese_Text: （毕竟，那是因为 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> ......\n再看看这样的东西。）

40070088.English_Text: Red plum, the leader of the plum flower group

40070095.English_Text: (I've cleared it up to some extent. \nNow there's no problem with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>supply</>?)
40070095.Chinese_Text: （我已经在某种程度上清除了它。\n现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>供应</>没有问题？）

40070097.English_Text: (Somewhere the smell of blood... What happened to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Mo Seo-Hun</>\n?)
40070097.Chinese_Text: （某处血腥味……<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Mo Seo-Hun</>\n发生了什么？）

40070099.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You have collected all the ingredients</>. Let's bring it to \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>)
40070099.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>你已经收集了所有的材料</>。让我们把它带给\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>)

40070100.English_Text: (Sighs... Let's make sure \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Amethyst</> is also okay)
40070100.Chinese_Text: （叹气......让我们确保\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Amethyst</> 也没有问题）

40070101.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Amethyst</> has already looked around \n? Let's check)
40070101.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Amethyst</> 已经看过\n？让我们检查一下)

40070102.English_Text: (The thing over there is obviously...! I got it!)
40070102.Chinese_Text: （那边的东西明明是……！我明白了！）

40070103.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Let's organize \n to help Aerin Yoo</>'s investigation!)
40070103.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>让我们组织\n帮助Aerin Yoo</>的调查！)
